DOC.brief_summary: Randomized control trial studying the effect of medical assistant health coaching for patients with diabetes, hypertension and hyperlipidemia within two San Francisco primary care community clinics, Mission Neighborhood Health Center and Southeast Health Center
DOC.brief_title: Study of Medical Assistant Health Coaching in Primary Care for Patients With Chronic Conditions
DOC.criteria: Active patients at Mission Neighborhood Health Center, SF, USA or Southeast Health Center, SF, USA age 1875 years Uncontrolled diabetes II, hypertension or hyperlipidemia Spanish or English speaking Cognitive dysfunction, mental health or physical condition that prevents participation in health coaching.
